Utilites: Client-Initiator cs_header
Information
Verilog Data Types elements:
Integer 2 states
  SHUNT ENUM       |  SV type    | function
------------------------------------------------------------------------
SHUNT_INT          | int         | shunt_cs_xxxx_intV
SHUNT_SHORTINT     | shortint    | shunt_cs_xxxx_shortV
SHUNT_LONGINT      | longint     | shunt_cs_xxxx_longV
SHUNT_BYTE         | byte        | shunt_cs_xxxx_byteV
SHUNT_BIT          | bit         | shunt_cs_xxxx_bitN.
Integer 4 states
  SHUNT ENUM       |  SV type     |  function
------------------------------------------------------------------------
  SHUNT_INTEGER    | integer,time |  shunt_cs_xxxx_integerV
  SHUNT_REG        | reg,logic    |  shunt_cs_xxxx_regN
Non integer types IEEE 754
  SHUNT ENUM       |  SV type     |  function
------------------------------------------------------------------------
 SHUNT_REAL        | real,realtime| shunt_cs_xxxx_doubleV
 SHUNT_SHORTREAL   | shortreal    | shunt_cs_xxxx_floatV
 SHUNT_STRING      | string       | shunt_cs_xxxx_byteV
Special Shunt types
SHUNT_A_STRUCTURE | complex data types/user defined data types : arrays/struct,union,enums (N/A)
Data exchange structures and utilities
Functions
shunt_cs_data_type_hash
INLINE shunt_long_t shunt_cs_data_type_hash(
shunt_long_t data_type,
const char* data_type_names[],
int last_enum
)

map data_type enum to the corresponding hash

Parameters
data_type/trnx_type

for valid data_type see SHUNT_INSTR_ENUM

data_type_names
const char*[]

data_type ( see SHUNT_INSTR_ENUM_NAMES ) or trnx_type names array

last_enum
int

number of data_type_names[] elements

Returns

hash index

See Also

shunt_cs_data_type_hash

INLINE int shunt_cs_data_type(
shunt_long_t hash,
const char* data_type_names[],
int last_enum
)

Parameters
data_type

hash index

data_type_names
const char*[]

data_type (see SHUNT_INSTR_ENUM_NAMES ) or trnx_type names array

last_enum
int

number of data_type_names[] elements

Returns

valid data_type see SHUNT_INSTR_ENUM -1 - No enum

See Also

shunt_cs_tlm_send_gp

int sockid,

const unsigned char* byte_enable
)

shunt_cs_tlm_recv_gp_data
INLINE void shunt_cs_tlm_recv_gp_data (
int sockid,
const cs_tlm_generic_payload_header* h,
shunt_long_t* data,
shunt_long_t* byte_enable
)

recieve tlm generic payload  packet (byte data vector + byte_enable vector )

Parameters
sockid
int

socket id from init sever/client

h
const cs_tlm_generic_payload_header*

cs_tlm_generic_payload_header (input only) should have a valid data length and byte_enable_length

data
shunt_long_t*

data payload byte-vector pointer  (output)

byte_enable
shunt_long_t*

byte_enable vector pointer (output)
